_sText:
I edited a previous map from Papycss called zm_zomb_lilapanic_3towers_v2, it was on a server where I play but it was leaked and people were falling underneath the map.
I recreated it after they said I was allowed to edit it and this is what I came up with.

Different textures.
Added sun.
Fixed leaks.
Made the top area smaller, keep action in one place.
Added some door functions.
Anti camp function, very affective!.
Some breakables on triggers to equal the balance.

It's a very zombie friendly map, probably unbalanced in favour of zombies :P
Done it quite a wile ago and it works well on the server and it's settings where I plays so I thought I would add it here.
Done it quite a wile ago that I have forgot the amount of spawns, its over 50 tho :o
